text: Fabrizio CalviLettre ouverte à Eric Laurent par Fabrizio Calvi (27 May 1954 – 23 October 2021) was a French investigative journalist. He focused on crime. He worked with Libération during most of his career. Calvi was born in Alexandria. Calvi, who had amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, warned he would commit suicide on 23 October 2021, aged 67.Fabrizio Calvi nous dit « ciao » ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Suicides Category:Italian journalists Category:French journalists
